author: Emma Grey Ellis
title: Coronavirus Conspiracy Theories Are a Public Health Hazard
description: It's time to debunk the worst—and most dangerous—Covid-19 misinformation.
content: Conspiracy theories will always circle major world events and disasters like paranoid vultures, but with the Covid-19 pandemic they have been given a feast. Since China first alerted the world to the spreading disease late last year, the coronavirus has inspi… [+6224 chars]
